name: The impossible planet (Archy_R6)
description:
[Press Space to start the game]

Based on the short story "The Impossible Planet" by Philip K Dick.

PS: This one is a really nice story and I strongly recommend to read the original story.

In the Milky Way galaxy, two small, unknown characters try to make a fortune by tricking a very, very old lady into travelling on their spacecraft to an isolated planet. But who really fooled whom?
